name: Tilos
description:
Conquer the grid in this one-of-a-kind real-time strategy game!
Enjoy unique, fast-paced gameplay in this grid-based strategy game,
including features such as:
- Local wireless play, so you can challenge your friends, for endless fun!
- Customizable colors
- Custom gameplay options, play it how you like it.

Enjoy the first game made by Detective Software Devs!

The game is free (ad-supported) on Android, check it out! 

iOS possibly coming soon.

Privacy Policy
